analyzed: 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i lha/_/gzhan du kyang pa'i sbyor bas te/_/lhan cig skyes

analyzed: dga'i gzugs can ma/_/skye gnas 'khor lo rtshibs drug pa/_/lte ba'i gnas

analyzed: e yig go/_/a i u e o am las/_/shar sogs g.yas su bskor ba yi/_/

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma drug 'god pa yin/_/nag dang dmar la sogs de bzhin/_/
translated: Black, red, and so forth, likewise,🔽are marked with their own seed syllables.🔽One’s body is the sun, and🔽the moon

analyzed: rang gi sa bon dag gis mtshhan/_/bdag nyid nyi ma'i lus de bzhin/_/zla

analyzed: bdag med ma'i stobs kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Wheel of Nairātmyā’s Power

analyzed: lus ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo ru/_/bgegs rnams phur bus gdab par bya/_/

analyzed: bde chen 'khor lo'i dbus gnas par/_/zla ba chu shel mnyam pa'i 'od/_/a

analyzed: i u i lo ah_ham/_/de las ye shes chu rgyun gyis/_/sdig 'joms lam las

analyzed: 'ongs pa gang /_/rnal 'byor ma sogs khrus bya'o/_/om ah_om hu~m phat swa ha/

analyzed: de ltar yid kyis bzlas bya zhing /_/gzhan ni gang yang mi bsam ste/_/zla drug

analyzed: tsham gyi nges par ni/_/ye shes skye bar the tshhom med/_/nag po dmar po de nas
translated: Then, without doubt, the gnosis will arise.🔽One should always meditate on the supreme yoga,🔽the expansion and withdrawal of black, red,

original: ser/_/ljang khu sngon po dkar po yi/_/spro dang de bzhin bsdud pa dag_/🔽rnal 'byor mchog gi rtag tu bsgom/_/ces pa slob dpon bde ba chen po'i zhal
